projects.name: GeoTrace
projects.description: Desktop application which traces a path from you to an IP or DNS. Uses Traceroute / Tracert get a list of visited IPs, using these it fetches the geolocation and plots it on a 2D map.

projects.name: Tetris AI
projects.description: AI playing Tetris. Implemented with genetic algorithm, imitation and DQN.

projects.name: Den Lure Vind
projects.description: Webpage and Server running on a Oracle Cloud VM. Serves some functionality for my portefolio. Mostly used for testing new things and hosting content.
